name: ConnectSettingsChange
doc: Any settings changes that a user executes

fields.name: time
fields.doc: Time when the change was done in seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC (Unix timestamp).

type.name: SettingType
type.doc: UNKNOWN: for any other input type.

fields.name: value
fields.doc: True/False depending on whether the setting has been enabled or disabled
